# CAUTION

`typings/*.ts` is not compatible with TypeScript.
Because this files is for [documentation](../docs).

But, We welcome pull request to fix this issue.

- [Use with TypeScript 路 Issue #248 路 textlint/textlint](https://github.com/textlint/textlint/issues/248 "Use with TypeScript 路 Issue #248 路 textlint/textlint")
